column4: what is the name of the of the winamp plugin for firefox?  I did a cache and synaptic search for winamp, did not find anything
ok, do I add xmms as a helper app, or ?
xmms is a player much like winamp (there is even a skin to look like that)
with the proper codecs in place, any app to use sound will use the codec, not the xmms it self
there is also the extremely light beep-media-player
ok, but the web site that I am using allows me to play video via firefox.  I don't know the videos url
I thought I had that, but will check..brb
actually: $ sudo apt-get install mplayer mozilla-mplayer
I went to syaptic and installed mozilla-mplayer
close and start firefox again, it must work
This web page is asking for winamp, will the mozilla plugin over ride that?
it still depends on the propper codecs, such as for WMV and RA
I upgraded to edgy, not sure if edgy kept my old (or upgraded) my codecs
